scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p dist && cp -R src/pages/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -R src/assets dist/assets 2>/dev/null || true && cp -R public/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:minify-css: npx --yes clean-css-cli -o dist/assets/css/global.css dist/assets/css/global.css && npx --yes clean-css-cli -o dist/assets/css/utilities.css dist/assets/css/utilities.css && npx --yes clean-css-cli -o dist/assets/css/main.css src/assets/css/main.css
scripts.build:minify-html: npx --yes html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true --file-ext html --input-dir dist --output-dir dist
scripts.build: npm run build:copy && npm run build:minify-css && npm run build:minify-js && npm run build:minify-html
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx serve dist
